attributes.review: This app wasn’t at all what I was lead to believe it was. First it asked for my phone number and after inputting it I have been getting nothing but spam and scam calls. Then I found that it was secretly an app run by the Russians to fool well meaning Americans.

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app i was searching for a good valuable reason to vote for the prez again but as soon as i clicked on the app my phone screen froze then the whole thing started to boil & heat up . it’s kinda like my phone knew i shouldn’t have been downloading that crap but regardless of that.. the app was still horrible & made my phone crash & i am now currently typing from the broken pieces of my phone :) ❤️🦋
